## Computational Neuroscience
::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .project-card}
![DTI impacts](assets/neuro/dti_impacts.gif)
**Quantitative Head-Injury Mapping**
Using geometry-aware manifold learning to quantify the latent relationship between 3D head-impact exposure and white matter microstructural changes using joint multidimensional scaling and Wasserstein metrics
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .project-card}
![SNN](assets/neuro/snn.mp4)
**Neuromorphic Motion Tracking**
Implementing a spiking neural network (LIF) in Nengo to emulate the visual processing pathway, utilizing Kalman filters for optimal sensorimotor integration during a multiple object tracking task.
:::

:::

## Wearable sensor analytics

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .project-card}
![Gait analysis](assets/sport/gait.gif)
**Bio-mechanical Signal Extraction**
Decoding multi-directional kinematics and gait phase dynamics from torso-worn inertial sensors (IMU) in game.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .project-card}
![HR model](assets/sport/hr_lti.gif)
**Hybrid Physiological Modeling**
Integrating Gradient Boosting (XGB) with Linear Time-Invariant (LTI) systems to model heart rate dynamics during high-intensity exertion.
:::

:::

## Mathematical modeling in sport

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-3 .project-card}
![Team movement patterns & algebraic braids](assets/sport/braid.gif)
**Topological Dynamics**
Quantifying team coordination and tactical behavior through the lens of algebraic braid theory.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-3 .project-card}
![Ball passing strategy & dynamic network analysis](assets/sport/hypernet.gif)
**Hyper-network Analysis**
Modeling multi-agent passing strategies using higher-order network science to identify hidden tactical structures.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-3 .project-card}
![Match tempo, movement intensity, & team flow](assets/sport/divwave.gif)
**Vector Fields**
Analyzing team "tempo" and spatial synchronization using divergence waves and spatiotemporal intensity metrics.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-3 .project-card}
![Sprint mechanics & limb coordination manifolds](assets/bio-mechanics/sprint-class.gif)
**Coordination Manifolds**
Extracting low-dimensional movement manifolds from high-dimensional kinematic data to classify elite sprint mechanics.
:::
